title: Aid Deliveries to Gaza Remain Low Despite U.S. Warning to Israel
content: The Biden administration gave Israel 30 days to increase the flow of aid, warning that aid shipments into Gaza in September had reached an alarmingly low level.
summary: The Biden administration gave Israel 30 days to increase the flow of aid, warning that aid shipments into Gaza in September had reached an alarmingly low level.

title: Notre-Dame Cathedral Is Ready to Reopen in December
content: Millions of visitors are expected at the cathedral after it reopens in December for the first time since the devastating 2019 fire.
summary: Millions of visitors are expected at the cathedral after it reopens in December for the first time since the devastating 2019 fire.

title: After Deadly Car Rampage, Chinese Officials Censor and Obstruct
content: Workers cleared away flowers laid at the site of the attack, while censors scrubbed online criticism. The goal is to stifle potential questions and criticism.

title: Russia Launches Missiles Against Ukraine’s Capital

summary: The attack ended a two-month pause in missile strikes on Kyiv, which had only been hit by Russian drones during that period.

title: U.K. Plans to Fine Tech Executives for Illegal Weapon Sales Online
content: In a bid to curb knife crime, the government would hold officials of tech companies personally liable for illicit sales on their platforms, a significant shift in internet regulation.
summary: In a bid to curb knife crime, the government would hold officials of tech companies personally liable for illicit sales on their platforms, a significant shift in internet regulation.

title: Who Are Mike Huckabee and Steven Witkoff, Trump’s Middle East Picks?

title: Gaza Militants Release Video of Sasha Troufanov, an Israeli Russian Hostage

title: 2,100 Fakes Rounded Up in Art Forgeries Bust

title: Four Tropical Storms Swirl Simultaneously Near the Philippines
content: It is the first time on record that more than three tropical storms have occurred at the same time in November in the region.

title: A Former Harrods Employee Accuses Al-Fayed of Trafficking and Says His Brother Knew

title: Chinese Students Went on Mass Night Bike Rides. Officials Shut Them Down.
